For the avid tennis player or tennis fan, Avila offers many premier events throughout the year. From fun socials and club championships to large scale charity and community events, there are many ways to get involved. Members can test their skill against the best players around. These events draw a crowd, which usually gathers on the second floor balcony above the Pro Shop. Avila is proud to present: Monthly Tennis Socials Ladies Nights Out (June – August) Singles Ladder Club Singles Championships Club Doubles Championships Club Mixed Doubles Championships Family Tennis Championships Avila Charity Tennis Tournament Director of Tennis Roger Cypriano 813.968.6792 tennis@avilagolf.com < Hours of Operation Monday-Friday 8:00 a.m.-1:00 p.m. & 3:00-8:00 p.m. Saturday-Sunday 8:00 a.m.-5:00 p.m. Amenities Teams & Leagues Junior Programs Events Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment End Flex Utils /twelve.columns /footer-wrap [if (gte IE 6)&(lt IE 8)]>

Avila Golf & Country Club is a private, full-service club found within the ivy covered walls of Tampa Bay’s most exclusive luxury community. Members enjoy an outstanding 18-hole Jack Nicklaus golf course and superb tennis, swimming, and dining amenities. The rich rewards of an Avila Membership include: • No advance tee time reservations necessary • No assessments • Club Concierge for tickets to select theater performances • Member Alliance for business and social networking • Ladies Luncheons and off-site excursions • Bi-monthly club newsletter • Complimentary Notary service Please Contact the Director of Member Relations for additional membership and financing information. Director of Member Relations Kelly Lawson 813.963.3537 klawson@avilagolf.com Membership Options Request Information Newsletter A classic and traditional club, Avila offers golfers and sports enthusiasts the luxuries and anonymity of a Country Club lifestyle. Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment End Flex Utils /twelve.columns /footer-wrap [if (gte IE 6)&(lt IE 8)]>

Avila Members experience year-round activities at Avila with the best life has to offer in a private country club lifestyle. With several membership categories to choose from, we’re confident that you will find one suited for your sports, dining and leisure needs. Family Membership Family Membership entitles married couples full privileges of the golf course, clubhouse, fitness center, tennis facilities and swimming pool. Children under 23 are considered Junior members. end div.wp-tab-content Family Limited Membership Family Limited Membership entitles the primary spouse unlimited full privileges on the golf course. All Family Limited members have full use of the clubhouse, fitness center, tennis facilities and swimming pool. Limited golfing privileges apply for the spouse and children under 23. Golf play times are Tuesday-Friday until 1:00 p.m. and after 5:00 p.m., Saturdays and holidays beginning at 1:00 p.m. and Sundays at 11:00 a.m. end div.wp-tab-content Executive Membership Executive Membership entitles the member full privileges of the golf course. Primary member, spouse and children under 23 have unlimited use of the clubhouse, fitness center, tennis facilities and swimming pool. By paying the applicable guest fee, the spouse and children may play unlimited golf as the guest of a spouse Executive member. The spouse of an Executive member must accompany the spouse and children during play. end div.wp-tab-content Junior Golf Membership Junior Golf Membership entitles Avila member’s children under 23 restricted use of the golf course, clubhouse, swimming pool, and tennis facilities. Membership expires on 23rd birth date. Junior members must be the children of a Family, Family Limited, Executive, Corporate or Intermediate Member. Junior members may play golf anytime Tuesday-Friday. Starting times begin at noon on Saturday and Sunday. No initiation fee. Junior members may extend guest invitations to other Junior members with a maximum of five times per year for the same guest; however, Junior members may not bring adults to the Club as guests. end div.wp-tab-content National Membership National Membership By invitation only. Candidates for the National Membership must be members in good standing of a private country club outside a 120-mile radius of Avila Golf and Country Club. The residence and the primary business of National Membership candidates must also be located outside a 120-mile radius. end div.wp-tab-content Amenities Membership Amenities Membership entitles the member, spouse and children under 23, unlimited use of the tennis facilities, clubhouse, fitness center and swimming pool. By paying the applicable guest fee, Amenities members may use the golf course four times per year as the guest of a golf member. end div.wp-tab-content Intermediate Golf Membership Intermediate Golf Membership entitles those 23 years of age and older, but not yet 40 years of age to full privileges of the golf course. The Intermediate member, spouse and children under 23 have unlimited use of the clubhouse, fitness center, tennis facilities and swimming pool. By paying the applicable guest fee, the spouse and children may play unlimited golf as the guest of the Intermediate member. end div.wp-tab-content end div.wp-tabs Director of Member Relations Kelly Lawson 813.963.3537 klawson@avilagolf.com Membership Options Request Information A classic and traditional club, Avila offers golfers and sports enthusiasts the luxuries and anonymity of a Country Club lifestyle. Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment End Flex Utils /twelve.columns /footer-wrap [if (gte IE 6)&(lt IE 8)]>

Avila Golf & Country Club is considered one of America’s most exclusive and beautiful Country Clubs. A classic and traditional club, Avila was built in 1980 offering golfers and sports enthusiasts the luxuries and anonymity of Country Club entertaining. A family friendly Club, Avila offers junior golf programs, annual social activities and pool and tennis recreation. Amenities include 18-holes of golf, six lighted Har-Tru tennis courts, fully equipped pro shops, junior Olympic-size swimming pool and newly renovated, Mediterranean-style Clubhouse. The signature golf course was redesigned in 1988 by developer Bob Sierra of Avila and partner Jack Nicklaus. This partnership created other highly acclaimed communities such as Wynstone, English Turn, Country Club of the South, Bear Creek, and Country Club of Louisiana. History Established in 1980, Avila continues to be one of the region’s preeminent private golf and country clubs. In 1988, Bob Sierra, developer of Avila, chose Jack Nicklaus, his partner in Nicklaus/Sierra Development Corporation, to redesign the golf course in Avila. Together, the same partnership that created other exceptional communities like Wynstone, English Turn, Country Club of the South, Bear Creek, and Country Club of Louisiana, produced one of the most highly-acclaimed golf courses in the region. General Questions 813.961.1770 webmaster@avilagolf.com Maps & Directions Contact Us Hours of Operation Employment A classic and traditional club, Avila offers golfers and sports enthusiasts the luxuries and anonymity of a Country Club lifestyle. At Avila Golf and Country Club, quality and taste are our passion! Our food reflects our commitment to exceptional quality. With every bite just as delicious as the next, our menu is indeed a feast for the eyes! Avila’s Catering Portfolio highlights some of our specialties; however, we are happy to create custom catering menus for your special occasion. Whether you are planning a business meeting, intimate dinner, bridal shower, or birthday party, Avila’s private event rooms will inspire an event that is memorable and caters to your group’s specific needs and our event experts will help you to decide the perfect menu for your extraordinary event. Careful planning and top-notch service are critical to the success of any event. And our team of experts delivers in this respect, providing personal attention to every aspect, from planning and logistics to catering and banquets to audio-visual services, special events, and more. Call us today to schedule an event planning consultation. Director of Special Events Kelly Lawson 813.963.3537 klawson@avilagolf.com Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment End Flex Utils /twelve.columns /footer-wrap [if (gte IE 6)&(lt IE 8)]>

Avila takes pride working with local charities through member sponsorship to benefit Tampa Bay charitable organizations. Avila has a long-standing history of charitable and community support. We host a select number of member sponsored golf outings, tennis tournaments and other events, all benefiting the Tampa Bay area. Events may be booked on Mondays and other select dates throughout the year. Many organizations have hosted fundraising events at Avila including Derek Jeter’s Celebrity Golf Tournament, Hemophilia Foundation of Tampa, Hillsborough Education Foundation, and more. Let our team put their experience to work for you. Avila’s elegant Clubhouse provides first-class amenities and is the perfect setting for your next event. Our dedicated team will assist you in creating the perfect menu to complement your golf or tennis tournament, live or silent auction, celebrity event or other charitable function. Our PGA professionals will orchestrate your golf tournament and coordinate tournament logistics. From guest arrival to customized scorecards, event scoring and awards presentations, we are confident your event will flow seamlessly. Contact us today to start planning your event! Director of Special Events Kelly Lawson 813.963.3537 klawson@avilagolf.com Weddings Catering & Events Charity Events Request Information Event Photo Gallery Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment End Flex Utils /twelve.columns /footer-wrap [if (gte IE 6)&(lt IE 8)]>

Tennis leagues and ladders are available for men and women of all skill levels year round. There are numerous options to participate on the Avila traveling team that plays other tennis clubs in the area. The Tennis Pavilion regularly hosts both doubles and singles leagues for members and their guests. Members can drop by the Tennis Pavilion and talk with our tennis staff to find a league that fits their level of competition. Tennis Leagues Women USTA 3.0 Level Tuesday Evening Women USTA 2.5 Level Friday Mornings Interbay Wednesday Mornings Women USTA 3.5 Level & USTA Combo 7.5 Level Thursday Mornings Men USTA 7.5 & 8.5 Level Saturday Mornings 20 Point Singles Ladder Men & Women Division Director of Tennis Roger Cypriano 813.968.6792 tennis@avilagolf.com < Hours of Operation Monday-Friday 8:00 a.m.-1:00 p.m. & 3:00-8:00 p.m. Saturday-Sunday 8:00 a.m.-5:00 p.m. Amenities Teams & Leagues Junior Programs Events Member Login Like Us on Facebook Employment End Flex Utils /twelve.columns /footer-wrap [if (gte IE 6)&(lt IE 8)]>
